title: Amazon Echo: Crowley Edition (Good Omens)
author: Spaceclover
comment: That’s the only Alexa I would consider getting

"how do you spell cantaloupe"
Crowley: just makes weird noises.
Either your Alexa needs new batteries or Crowley is drunk again.
I lost it at "how the heaven should I know?"

😂😂😂
her: Alexa what day is it?
Alexa: Armageddon 
Her: (nudging hubby while trying to sleep) honey get up
Helps him wake up... Crowley literally sings gooo to sleeeep... Lol.
description:
Aziraphale edition (not sold separately): https://youtu.be/__V5LS49gV8
All songs played by this device morph into Best of Queen. Crazy how it do that.
Thanks for watching!


These have been sitting in my drafts since late 2019 but better late than never right?
